title: Ford’s Dividend Is Back, Stoking Optimism on Wall Street
sub_head: Automaker had previously suspended quarterly payout in March 2020 to conserve cash
body:
Ford Motor Co. ’s stock jumped to its highest level in years following an upbeat financial projection and optimism that the automaker is reinstating its quarterly dividend.
Shares rose as much as 13% on Thursday before trimming gains in afternoon trading. At its intraday high, the stock traded at its highest level since September 2014.
